name: 6x4 Cluster for Power (~12 min)
time_per_session_breakdown: 6 sets x ~20-30s each + 2 min rest => ~12 min total
overview_and_execution: Load ~80% 1RM. Perform 4 explosive reps, rest ~15s if needed to maintain power, then repeat until 6 total sets of 4 are completed. Increase weight 2.5â€“5 lbs as speed improves.
example_application: Power Clean @ 165 lbs: 4 reps, rest 15s if needed, 4 reps. Repeat until 6 sets total, resting 2 min between. Add weight when bar speed stays high.
important_notes: Focus on explosiveness and proper form; do not grind reps.
